ns4:message.ns4:content: Mission Initializing...
From the VBS main menu, go to Networking. Select the appropriate Host and click Join.
You will be playing as BLUFOR actor named "1-1-A-6: Leader - M4 RCO - IOTV, group leader". Click 'OK' on the right hand side (in VBS) to continue.
You will be playing as BLUFOR actor named "1-1-A-7: Leader - M4 RCO - IOTV". Click 'OK' on the right hand side (in VBS) to continue.
You will be playing as BLUFOR actor named "1-1-A-9: Automatic Rifleman - M249 MGO - IOTV". Click 'OK' on the right hand side (in VBS) to continue.
You will be playing as BLUFOR actor named "1-1-B-2: Leader - M4 RCO - IOTV". Click 'OK' on the right hand side (in VBS) to continue.
You will be the driver of Vehicle 1.
You will be the driver of Vehicle 2.
Your assigned vehicle is Vehicle 1.
After the PL has issued the OPORD Brief and Map Recon, you need to assess their performance in the Assessment panel.
Follow the provided GPS navigation arrows to reach your OBJ. Remember to maintain the proper ETA.
Don't forget to provide an assessment when the PL reports the checkpoint to HQ!

concept.name: Report Entrance of Village and Civilian Presence

ns4:message.ns4:content: Don't forget to provide an assessment when the PL reports the next checkpoint to HQ!

point.name: B Platoon Approaching Ambush Alert Location

stateTransition.name: Vehicles Waiting to Exit FOB Gate

strategyRef.name: Message to O/C - Open the FOB Gate
Message to O/C - Team Approaching IED Event
Message to O/C - Team Stopped After IED
Minimize Radio Chatter Message to Team

stateTransition.name: Late Vehicle Transfer to Uncrowded Path
Vehicles No Longer Following GPS Route

strategyRef.name: Message to O/C - Vehicles Left GPS Route

stateTransition.name: Vehicles Waiting to Enter Outpost Gate

strategyRef.name: Message to O/C - Open the Outpost Gate

strategy.name: Message to O/C - Open the FOB Gate

ns4:message.ns4:content: Open the FOB gate for the vehicles using the appropriate strategy preset.
You are going too fast, slow down!
You are going too fast, slow down!
You are not properly spaced with your lead vehicle! Get back in formation!

strategy.name: Message to O/C - Team Approaching IED Event

ns4:message.ns4:content: A significant event is about to occur. Notify your proctor when you identify this event on the map.

strategy.name: Minimize Radio Chatter Message to Team

ns4:message.ns4:content: Keep the radio chatter to a minimum!

strategy.name: Message to O/C - Team Stopped After IED

ns4:message.ns4:content: The team has stopped before the checkpoint, confirm this assessment is correct for the Proper Stop Reaction to IED box in the Assessment panel.
After reporting your arrival at the checkpoint, wait for HQ orders before moving on.
New intel just came through notifying you that air support has spotted civilians blocking the players path. Notify them to take their next left to avoid causalities!!
HQ: The other teams are now in place, you can move out.

strategy.name: Push New Route Intel to Team

ns4:message.ns4:content: New intel just came in: there are civilians blocking your current route. Take the next left and follow that path to until it is clear. Then continue to follow your GPS.
Vehicles are now being transported.....

strategy.name: Message to O/C - Vehicles Left GPS Route

ns4:message.ns4:content: Alert: The vehicles are no longer on the GPS provided route.

strategy.name: Message to O/C - Open the Outpost Gate

ns4:message.ns4:content: Open the Outpost gate for the vehicles.
A significant event is about to occur involving the B platoon. Notify your proctor when you identify this event on the map.
